entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this morning and early this afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
